_aChangeLog.text: Improved the bot's movement through all stairways

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_NIGHTHAWK_PRO

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: November 17 2015

Here is the Navigation Mesh for nice military-styled map de_nighthawk_pro by Sk3tch (released August 2010). It's a totally created from scratch and carefully optimized .nav-file (because in original author's release the .nav-file probably was simple auto-gen embedded in .bsp, also the announced nav-file by Chizbone wasn't released).

This Navigation Mesh was hand-made approximately for 90% 'cause auto-gen constructed many areas inexact. The special attention was paid to important areas with difficult geometry of subjects: under and over the jet (BombsiteA), under and over the missile rack (BombsiteB), pathway through the hole in a floor (Dumpster).

The bots use all possible ways now. Especially they are interested in such toys as jet and missiles... that's quite normally for a humanoids of any faith and a nationality :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing an original auto-gen .nav-file (embedded in .bsp-file) and available to downloading with the same map.

Play & Enjoy! Always will be grateful for your remarks and feedbacks.

Credits and Gratitudes: Sk3tch (for old good military-styled map)

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

I want things to be fast, down to the power-drive,
I want the zero-gravity heroes to play dead, but stay alive :-)
